definition: El Niño effect, equatorial climatic variation over the Pacific Ocean
pinyin: e4 er3 ni2 nuo4 xian4 xiang4

sentences.english: The almond has the phenomenon of pistil and stamens ripe in different time.
sentences.chinese: 扁桃存在明显的雌雄蕊异熟现象。

sentences.english: In modern poetry, there are sound and meaning with the structure of the phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 在现代诗词中存在着音义同构的现象。

sentences.english: Resilience is not simply an individual characteristic or a psychological phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 适应力不单单是个体特征或者心理现象。

sentences.english: The pulse discharge phenomena of gas-liquid mixture in wire-wire gap are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了气液混合两相体中线线电极脉冲放电现象。

sentences.english: The early failure phenomena of flyback transformer was discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 文章就回扫变压器的早期失效现象进行了探讨。

sentences.english: Redundancy is a linguistic phenomenon that the linguistic form is more than its linguistic content.
sentences.chinese: 羡余现象，是指语言的表达形式多于表达内容。

sentences.english: Striking beating patterns in magnetoresistance vs magnetic field are observed in the vicinity of a specific temperature.
sentences.chinese: 在一定温度范围内观察到磁阻拍频现象。

sentences.english: From this viewpoint, globalisation is a kind of phenomenological tool for making sense of the world.
sentences.chinese: 从这个观点看，全球化是个认识世界现象的逻辑工具。

sentences.english: Phenomenon of estuarine turbidity maximum zone is modeled by 2-dimensional numerical model.
sentences.chinese: 利用平面二维数值模型模拟河口最大浑浊带现象。

sentences.english: When people's minds aren't yet emancipated and their thinking remains rigid, curious phenomena emerge.
sentences.chinese: 思想不解放，思想僵化，很多的怪现象就产生了。

sentences.english: Well, Translucency is one of those phenomenon that goes a bit beyond your everyday Lambertian diffuse.
sentences.chinese: 那么，这些现象是半透明多少超越你天天朗伯漫。

sentences.english: Even also presented "overworks dies" the phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 甚至还出现了“过劳死”的现象。

sentences.english: Europeanization is the output of language contact between the English and Chinese language.
sentences.chinese: 汉语的欧化现象是鸦片战争以来英汉语言接触的产物。

sentences.english: On carrying our his experiment, Faraday discovered electromagnetic induction.
sentences.chinese: 在进行实验时，法拉第发现了电磁感应现象。

sentences.english: Retroflex suffixation in Chinese is a phenomenon of syllable merger.
sentences.chinese: 汉语儿化是一种音节融合现象。

sentences.english: This kind of false breakdown is one kind slants actually lubricious phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 这种假故障其实是一种偏色现象。

definition: to appear/to arise/to emerge/to show up
to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
